bug.short_desc: Missing pyxdg as Requires in libabigail-1.0-0.8.rc5.3.fc24
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Installing NVR libabigail-1.0-0.8.rc5.3.fc24 works fine. Later on, running command "fedabipkgdiff --help" gives following error: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/fedabipkgdiff", line 35, in <module> import xdg.BaseDirectory ImportError: No module named xdg.BaseDirectory
Looking into spec file, it seems we need to add pyxdg in Requires section.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 1.0-0.8.rc5.3.fc24

Created attachment 1195331 Add missing dependencies
Patch originally filed by Chenxiong Qi

(In reply to Dodji Seketeli from comment #1) > Created attachment 1195331 [details] > Add missing dependencies > > Patch originally filed by Chenxiong Qi
This patch was originally filed at https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=20356

Comment on attachment 1195331 Add missing dependencies
I have reviewed this patch and it looks good.
I have amended it to bump the revision of the package and add an RPM ChangeLog entry.
What I have committed is at http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/libabigail.git/commit/?id=9e71dd557103683576955c6f29b0059cf8e8f1be

So, the Rawhide build with the fix is at http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=795362.
I'll backport the fix to stable packages a little bit later.
Thanks.
